Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary  Reroute at  Roosevelt/Central Park
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Central Park, Douglas, Homan, and Roosevelt due to Police activity near Roosevelt/Central Park

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Central Park, Douglas, Homan, and Roosevelt  due to Police activity near Roosevelt /Central Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed near Argyle
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near Argyle due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near Argyle due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
